articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun meets Italian ambassador 
     Pyongyang, March  9 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun today met and conversed with Paolo Bruni, newly-appointed Italian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him.
